sources.full: Honourable Heroes; Higher CR Humanoids for Encounters

trait.name: Brave
entries: 典狱长在对被攻击者的救赎上有优势（%0%）。

trait.name: Half-Swording
entries: 典狱长能够在手持长剑的情况下抓取生物，就像他们有一只手一样。此外，当他们做出抓取或推搡动作时，他们在相关的力量卷轴上有优势。

trait.name: Shoulder Bash
entries: 如果典狱长在其回合内用近战武器击中一个生物至少两次，他们可以对其进行推挤攻击作为一个额外动作。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: 典狱长可以使用它的额外行动来恢复7({@dice 1d8 + 3})点的生命值。他们在完成短时或长时休息后会重新使用这个能力。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 典狱长会进行三次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，距离5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})重击、穿刺或切割伤害，如果双手使用，则有8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})重击、穿刺或切割伤害。

action.name: Inspire {@recharge}
entries: 在典狱长15英尺范围内的所有盟友都会在他们的攻击和伤害卷上获得相当于典狱长魅力修改器的奖励，直到典狱长的下一个回合结束。

action.name: Pugno Mortis {@recharge}
entries: 典狱长可以点燃一个黑火药炸弹，并向60英尺以外的地方投掷。在该点5英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 13}灵巧的救赎中成功，否则就会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Crushing Counterstrike
entries: 作为对试图对典狱长进行近身攻击的生物的反应，典狱长可以强迫他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果典狱长成功了，他们可以对该生物进行一次近战攻击，而触发的攻击则被浪费了。否则，该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 典狱长在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在他们的反应力上增加3。要做到这一点，典狱长必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: 百夫长在对被（%0%）和（%1%）的救赎上有优势。

trait.name: Eagle's Fury
entries: 如果百夫长向一个生物移动至少10英尺，并以近战攻击击中它，它会对该生物造成额外的3（（%0%））的伤害。

trait.name: Incredibilis!
entries: 每回合一次，当百夫长以徒手攻击击中一个生物时，他们可以强迫对方做一个{@dc 15}力量救赎，或者被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一回合开始时被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Infirmus!
entries: 百夫长对{@condition prone}或{@condition incapacitated}的生物造成额外的7({@damage 2d6}的伤害。）

trait.name: Lion's Bite
entries: 每回合一次，百夫长可以进行一次他们的角斗士攻击，攻击卷的惩罚为-5。如果攻击命中，他们会在攻击的伤害上增加+10。

trait.name: Lion's Roar
entries: 如果百夫长成功地抓住了一个生物，他们可以对该生物进行徒手攻击作为一个额外的动作。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: 百夫长可以使用它的额外行动来恢复7({@dice 1d8 + 3})的打击点数。他们在完成短时或长时的休息后会重新使用这个能力。

trait.name: Gladius
entries: 当挥舞这把武器时，百夫长可以在采取攻击或多重攻击行动时，将一次徒手攻击作为额外行动。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 百夫长用它的角斗士或徒手打击进行三次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Gladius
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 7}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})穿刺伤害。一旦命中，目标必须成功进行{@dc 15}体质测试，否则将被{@condition incapacitated}击倒，直到下一回合开始。

reaction.name: Parry Counter
entries: 百夫长在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在反应力上加3。要做到这一点，百夫长必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。如果在招架后攻击未果，百夫长可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次徒手攻击。

trait.name: Impaling Charge
entries: 如果执法者向一个目标直线移动至少10英尺，然后在同一回合内用下一次近战武器攻击击中该目标，则该目标会受到正常的攻击伤害，并被推回相当于执法者剩余移动速度的英尺数，执法者会继续与目标保持直线前进。

trait.name: Steel Will
entries: 执法者在对（%0%）和（%1%）的救赎中具有优势。

trait.name: Powerful Shove
entries: 执法者可以在一个回合内用一次徒手攻击来代替他们的戟攻击。一旦命中，该生物将受到6({@damage 1d4 + 4})的重击伤害，并且必须成功进行{@dc 15}的力量救赎，否则将被{@condition incapacitated}推至下一回合开始并被推至5英尺。

trait.name: Ruat Caelum
entries: 在挥舞长戟的时候，其他生物在进入执法者的范围时，会引发一次机会攻击。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: 执法者可以使用它的额外行动来恢复8({@dice 1d8 + 4})的打击点数。他们在完成短时或长时休息后会重新使用这个能力。

trait.name: Swift Justice
entries: 如果执法者在自己的回合中用长戟击中一个生物至少两次，他们可以对该生物进行长戟提示攻击，作为一个额外动作。

trait.name: The Long Arm
entries: 每回合一次，执法者可以用他们的一次近身攻击来代替将目标翻转过来的尝试。如果该生物是大型或小型的，他们必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}的力量投掷，或者被移动到与执法者相反的5英尺范围内，被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一回合开始，并被击倒{@condition prone}。大型生物在救赎动作上有优势；小型或较小的生物在救赎动作上有劣势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 法律使者可以进行三次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})重击、穿刺或砍击伤害。

action.name: Halberd Cue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击或穿刺伤害。一旦命中，目标必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}体质训练，否则会被{@condition incapacitated}击倒，直到下一个回合开始。

action.name: Igneus Imber {@recharge}
entries: 执法者可以在60英尺以外的三个点上点燃并投掷黑火药炸弹。在所选地点5英尺范围内的每个生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 13}灵巧救赎，否则将受到10({@damage 3d6})的火力伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Parry Punish
entries: 执法者在对抗一次近战攻击时，会在反应力上增加3点。要做到这一点，刷法者必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。如果在招架后攻击未果，刷法者可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次戟或戟尖攻击。

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: 每回合一次，士兵可以对其用武器攻击击中的生物造成额外的2（（%0%））伤害，如果该生物在士兵的盟友5英尺内，而该盟友不是（%1%）。

action.name: Broadsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Cold Blooded Killer
entries: 维持和平者在对被（%0%）和（%1%）的救赎上有优势。

trait.name: Deep Gouge
entries: 如果和平卫士成功地用它的武装剑近身攻击击中一个生物，它可以在同一回合用它的匕首作为奖励动作进行一次有利的攻击。

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: 维持和平者可以在它的每个回合中采取脱离或隐藏行动作为奖励行动。

trait.name: Sidestep Strike
entries: 和平卫士可以用它的武装剑进行一次近战攻击，作为采取躲避行动的一部分。

trait.name: Stealthy
entries: 维和人员在为隐藏而进行的灵巧（隐身）检查中具有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 维和人员用其武装剑进行两次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Arming Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 8}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})穿刺伤害。一旦命中，该生物必须在下一回合开始时成功地进行一次{@dc 16}宪法救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 4d4})的坏死伤害。该生物在1分钟内的每个回合都会重复这一救赎，直到它成功为止。这个效果的多个实例可以叠加。

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8}击中，范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺伤害。

reaction.name: Deflect
entries: 如果和平卫士在自己的回合中采取闪避行动后，近战攻击没有击中他们，和平卫士可以对发动攻击而没有击中的生物进行一次匕首攻击，并取得优势。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 和平卫士在对抗一次会击中它的近战攻击时，会在自己的AC上增加4。要做到这一点，和平卫士必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Brave
entries: 征服者在对被攻击者的蓄力攻击中具有优势（%0%）。

trait.name: Brute
entries: 近战武器在征服者用它击中时，会造成一个额外的模子的伤害（包括在攻击中）。

trait.name: Full Guard
entries: 征服者可以使用它的行动来采取防御姿态。征服者在其下一回合开始前，会获得+3的攻击力。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 如果征服者的命中率低于其最大命中率的一半，并且至少有1个命中率，那么它在回合开始时就会恢复9点命中。

trait.name: Shield Charge
entries: 如果征服者至少向一个生物直线移动10英尺，然后在同一回合用盾牌撞击击中它，该生物必须做一个{@dc 15}的力量救赎，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Wind Up
entries: 征服者可以使用它的额外行动来旋转它的长矛，为一次强大的攻击做准备。它所进行的下一次攻击会在卷起的伤害上增加+5。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 征服者进行两次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})重击伤害。命中后，该生物会被{@condition incapacitated}直到下一回合开始。

action.name: Pugno Mortis {@recharge}
entries: 征服者可以点燃一个黑火药炸弹，并向60英尺外的一个点投掷。在该点5英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 13}灵巧的救赎中成功，否则将受到10({@damage 3d6})的火力伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 如果不是全副武装，征服者在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在反应力上加3。要做到这一点，征服者必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器或盾牌。

reaction.name: Uppercut
entries: 当一个生物在征服者采取了完全守卫行动后，用近战攻击错过了征服者，如果它在范围内，征服者可以对该生物进行一次挥舞攻击。这就结束了全神贯注动作的奖励。

trait.name: Bamboozle
entries: 角斗士可以在他们的回合中用佯攻代替他们的一次攻击，用目标生物的智慧（洞察力）进行魅力（欺骗）检查。如果角斗士成功，他们在下一次对该生物的攻击中有优势。

trait.name: Bee's Sting
entries: 斗士可以用它的三叉戟进行一次近战攻击，作为采取躲避行动的一部分。

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: 斗士在对被攻击时有优势（%0%）和（%1%）。

trait.name: Cheap Shot
entries: 斗士在他们的回合中对一个{@condition incapacitated}的生物进行的第一次近战攻击自动命中。

trait.name: Fuscina Ictus
entries: 每回合一次，当角斗士用三叉戟近身攻击击中一个生物时，他们可以迫使该生物成功地进行一次{@dc 14}力量救赎，或者被击倒{@condition prone}和{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一回合开始。

trait.name: Skewer
entries: 每回合一次，当角斗士用三叉戟近战攻击击中一个生物时，他们可以将对手串起来。该生物如常承受攻击的伤害，并在下一回合开始前受到（%0%）的伤害。斗士在他们的回合中不再进行攻击。该生物在下一回合开始时，会受到额外的11({@damage 2d10})穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Standing Ovation
entries: 如果角斗士在一个回合内用其全部四次攻击击中一个生物，它可以对同一生物进行一次额外的攻击。如果额外的攻击命中，则被认为是关键一击。

trait.name: Sucker Punch
entries: 每回合一次，角斗士可以用他们的斗篷而不是三叉戟进行攻击。一旦命中，该生物就会被（%0%），直到下一回合开始。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 斗士会进行四次三叉戟近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 6}击中，范围5英尺或20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害，如果用双手进行近身攻击，则为7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})伤害。

action.name: Buckler
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

reaction.name: Counter Jab
entries: 斗士在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，其反击力增加3。要做到这一点，角斗士必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。如果在招架后攻击未果，角斗士可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次扣手攻击。

reaction.name: Skewer Deflect
entries: 如果角斗士在自己的回合中采取闪避行动后，近战攻击没有击中他们，角斗士可以对发动攻击而没有击中的生物进行一次三叉戟攻击，并取得优势。

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: 黑袍人在对被害人（%0%）和（%1%）的救赎上有优势。

trait.name: Bulwark Stance
entries: 黑袍人可以用它的行动来采取防御姿态。在这个姿态下，黑袍人的移动速度减半，它获得+3的攻击力，并且可以作为额外动作进行一次近战攻击。此外，黑袍人在他们的回合开始时恢复了7点生命值。黑袍人可以在他们的回合中作为额外行动退出这个姿态；在他们采取攻击行动、多重攻击行动、使用堡垒反击反应后，或者如果他们被（%0%）、（%1%）或被击倒（%2%），他们会自动退出这个姿态。

trait.name: Harsh Requiem
entries: 如果黑袍人在其回合内成功用攻击击中一个生物，他们在下一次对该生物的攻击中获得优势，直到其回合结束。

trait.name: Tenebris!
entries: 每回合一次，黑袍人可以用他们的盾牌撞击来代替他们的长剑进行攻击。一旦命中，该生物就会受到（%0%）的伤害，直到他们下一回合开始。

trait.name: Tower Shield
entries: 在挥舞这个盾牌的时候，如果黑袍人受到的效果允许它做一个灵巧的蓄力动作来承受一半的伤害，如果它蓄力动作成功，它可以使用它的反应来不受伤害，在它自己和效果的来源之间插入盾牌。
此外，如果黑袍人在其回合中的移动速度不超过其移动速度的一半，那么在挥舞此盾牌时，它将被视为处于半遮蔽状态，以对抗远程攻击。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 黑袍人可以进行两次长剑攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})砍击伤害，如果双手使用，则为9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Umbral Shelter {@recharge 5}
entries: 黑袍人可以用他们的行动来选择30英尺内任意数量的生物。被选择的生物会获得7({@dice 1d8 + 3})个临时打击点数。

reaction.name: Bulwark Counter
entries: 当处于堡垒状态时，作为对试图对黑袍人进行近战攻击的生物的反应，黑袍人可以将目标翻转到他们身上。如果该生物是大型或小型的，他们必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}的力量投掷，或者被移动到黑袍人对面的5英尺范围内，被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一个回合开始并被击倒{@condition prone}；然后黑袍人以优势对该生物进行一次近战攻击。大型生物在蓄力攻击上有优势；小型或更小的生物在蓄力攻击上有劣势。

reaction.name: Crushing Counterstrike
entries: 当不处于防卫状态时，作为对试图对黑袍人进行近身攻击的生物的反应，黑袍人可以强迫他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果黑袍人成功了，他们可以对该生物进行一次长剑攻击，并且触发的攻击被浪费掉。否则，该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 当不处于防卫状态时，黑袍人在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，他们的反应力会增加3。要做到这一点，黑袍人必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: 每回合一次，军官可以对其用武器攻击击中的生物造成额外的3({@damage 1d6})伤害，如果该生物在军官的盟友5英尺之内，而该盟友不是{@condition incapacitated}。

trait.name: Officer Tactics
entries: 盟军的生物在对军官5英尺范围内的任何对它有敌意的生物进行近战攻击时有优势。

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: 每回合一次，军官可以对其用武器攻击击中的生物造成额外的3({@damage 1d6})伤害，如果该生物在军官的盟友5英尺之内，而该盟友不是{@condition incapacitated}。

trait.name: Officer Tactics
entries: 盟军的生物在对军官5英尺范围内的任何对它有敌意的生物进行近战攻击时有优势。

action.name: Broadsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Raider's Storm
entries: 每回合一次，突击者可以用突击者之怒来代替他们的一次攻击。然而，如果他们这样做，他们在该回合不再进行攻击。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: 袭击者可以使用它的额外行动来恢复7({@dice 1d8 + 3})的打击点数。他们在完成短时或长时休息后重新使用这个能力。

trait.name: Rush
entries: 突击者可以将其速度提高一倍，直到其回合结束。一旦它使用了这个特性，它就不能再使用，直到它在某个回合中移动0英尺。

trait.name: Storming Tap
entries: 每回合一次，突击者可以用他们的长斧的鞍座而不是长斧进行一次攻击。一旦命中，该生物会被（%0%），直到下一回合开始。

trait.name: Stampede Charge
entries: 当突袭者成功抓捕一个生物时，它可以携带该生物并向前移动最多一半的移动速度，然后将该{@condition grappled}生物扔到突袭者停止的前方5英尺处，结束抓捕并将其他生物击倒{@condition prone}。
此外，如果突击者向一个生物移动了至少10英尺，并试图抓住它，突击者在它的运动能力卷上有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 袭击者用其长斧进行三次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Long Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Pommel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Raider's Fury
entries: 袭击者对范围内三个相邻的生物进行长斧攻击。

action.name: Bear Trap {@recharge 5}
entries: 袭击者的位置下降了（%0%）。

action.name: Fire Flask {@recharge}
entries: 袭击者向60英尺外的一个点投掷一壶易燃液体。在所选地点10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 13}的灵巧救赎中成功，否则就会受到12({@damage 5d4})的火焰伤害。如果救赎成功，伤害会减半。
火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到突袭者下一回合结束。在此期间进入该区域的生物必须做一个{@dc 13}的灵巧救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 袭击者在对付一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，在他们的反应力上增加3。要做到这一点，突击者必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器或盾牌。

trait.name: Rush
entries: 战神可以在其回合结束前将其速度加倍。一旦它使用了这个特性，它就不能再使用它，直到它在某个回合中移动0英尺。

trait.name: Headsplitter Leap
entries: 如果战神在一个回合中向一个生物至少直行5英尺并以第一次近战攻击击中它，它可以用第二次近战攻击代替尝试用头撞向一个生物。
如果该生物是大型或较小的，他们必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}宪法救赎，否则就会被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一个回合开始。然后战神可以用他们的剑作为奖励动作进行攻击。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 如果战神的命中率低于其最大命中率的一半，并且至少有1个命中率，则在其回合开始时恢复9点命中率。

trait.name: Full Guard
entries: 战神可以用它的行动来采取防御姿态。战神在下一回合开始前获得+3的攻击力。在全神贯注的状态下，战神可以将一次近战攻击作为奖励动作。

trait.name: Crashing Charge
entries: 如果战神在同一回合内向一个生物移动了至少10英尺，然后用盾牌击打它，它可以迫使该生物成功地进行一次{@dc 15}力量或灵巧的救赎（由目标选择）。拯救失败后，该生物会被推回，推回的距离与战神继续移动的距离相同，最多为战神的剩余移动速度。
如果该生物成功地进行了力量救赎，战神就会在该生物附近停下来。如果该生物成功地进行了灵巧救赎，战神将继续在该生物身边移动10英尺，然后停止。

trait.name: Punch Through
entries: 每当战神用它的乌尔贝特剑进行近战攻击时，如果攻击没有命中，但两张卷子中较高的一张（%0%）命中，则目标会受到相当于其力量修饰值的重击伤害（最小为0）。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 战神会进行两次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Ulfberht Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Bear Trap {@recharge 5}
entries: 战神放下了一个狩猎的陷阱。

action.name: Fire Flask {@recharge}
entries: 战神将一壶易燃液体抛向60英尺外的一个点。在所选地点10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 12}的灵巧救赎中成功，否则就会受到12({@damage 5d4})的火焰伤害。如果救赎成功，伤害会减半。
火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到战神的下一回合结束。在此期间，进入该区域的生物必须做一个{@dc 12}的灵巧救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Headbutt Riposte
entries: 当一个生物在战神采取了完全守卫行动后，用近战攻击错过了战神，战神可以尝试用头撞向一个生物。
如果该生物是大型或较小的，他们必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}宪法救赎，否则就会被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一个回合开始。然后，战神可以用他们的剑进行一次攻击，作为这个反应的一部分。这就结束了全副武装行动的奖励。

reaction.name: Shield Counter
entries: 如果不在全副武装状态下，战神在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时的反应力上增加3。要做到这一点，战神必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着盾牌。如果在盾牌反击后攻击未果，战神可以用他们的剑对发动攻击的生物进行一次近战攻击，作为该反应的一部分。

trait.name: Rush
entries: 狂暴战士可以将其速度加倍，直到其回合结束。一旦它使用这个特性，它就不能再使用，直到它在某个回合中移动0英尺。

如果一个回合的五次攻击都命中，第五次攻击会造成额外的5({@damage 2d4})伤害。

action.name: Multiattack

reaction.name: Brute Force
entries: 如果狂暴战士在自己的回合中采取闪避行动后，近身攻击没有击中，狂暴战士可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次有利的徒手攻击，而该攻击没有击中。

reaction.name: Skilled Slash
entries: 狂暴战士在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在他们的AC上增加3的反应。要做到这一点，狂暴战士必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。如果触发的攻击没有击中，狂暴战士可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次手斧攻击。

entries: 瓦尔基里可以将它的速度加倍，直到它的回合结束。一旦它使用这个特性，它就不能再使用，直到它在某个回合中移动0英尺。

entries: 瓦尔基里可以用它的长矛进行一次近战攻击，作为采取躲避行动的一部分。

如果这个生物没有救活，瓦尔基里可以对它进行一次长矛攻击作为奖励动作。

trait.name: Pouncing Thrust
entries: 如果瓦尔基里向一个生物直接移动至少10英尺，然后在同一回合用长矛攻击击中它，攻击会造成额外的4（（%0%））的伤害。

trait.name: Boar Hunter
entries: 每回合一次，瓦尔基里可以将其一次长矛攻击的范围增加5英尺。

trait.name: Full Block
entries: 瓦尔基里可以使用它的行动来采取防御姿态。瓦尔基里在下一回合开始前或受到伤害前都会获得+3的攻击力。然而，瓦尔基里的移动速度会降低到0英尺，并且它只能采取粉碎性反击和盾牌攻击的反应。

action.name: Multiattack

火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到瓦尔基里的下一回合结束。在这段时间内进入该区域的生物必须做一个{@dc 14}的灵巧救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Crushing Counterstrike
entries: 作为试图对瓦尔基里进行近战攻击的生物的反应，瓦尔基里可以迫使他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。
如果女武神成功了，他们可以对该生物进行一次长矛攻击，并且触发的攻击被浪费了。如果女武神在上一回合采取了完全阻挡行动，他们会进行一次盾牌撞击攻击，而不是长矛攻击，完全阻挡的奖励也会结束。
否则该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 瓦尔基里在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在反应力上增加3。要做到这一点，瓦尔基里必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器或盾牌。

reaction.name: Shield Tackle
entries: 当瓦尔基里采取完全阻挡行动后，一个生物的近战攻击没有击中瓦尔基里，如果它在范围内，瓦尔基里可以对该生物进行一次盾牌撞击的攻击。这将结束 "完全阻挡 "动作的奖励。

reaction.name: Shoulder Pin
entries: 如果瓦尔基里在自己的回合中采取躲避动作后，近战攻击没有击中，瓦尔基里可以在优势下对发动攻击的生物进行一次长矛攻击，但没有击中。如果该长矛攻击命中，该生物在下一回合开始时会受到额外的9({@damage 2d8})穿刺伤害。

entries: 萨满可以在其回合结束前将其速度加倍。一旦它使用这个特性，它就不能再使用，直到它在某个回合中移动0英尺。

trait.name: Raven's Claw
entries: 如果萨满用手斧的近战攻击成功击中一个生物，它可以在同一回合用它的库克里刀作为额外动作进行一次有利的攻击。
一旦被击中，目标生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}宪法救赎，否则在其下一回合开始时受到10({@damage 4d4})的坏死伤害。该生物在1分钟内的每个回合都会重复这一救赎，或者直到它成功为止。这个效果的多个实例可以叠加。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: 萨满可以使用它的额外行动来恢复7({@dice 1d8 + 3})的打击点数。他们在完成短时或长时休息后重新使用这个能力。

trait.name: Wild Cat's Swiftness
entries: 萨满可以用它的手斧进行一次近战攻击，作为采取躲避行动的一部分。

trait.name: Blood Trance
entries: 如果萨满用近身攻击击中受其乌鸦之爪特质或乌鸦之喙反应影响的生物，萨满会重新获得与所受伤害相等的命中率。
此外，如果萨满成功地抓住受影响的生物，萨满会咬它们，造成12（（%0%））的坏死伤害，并为萨满治疗与造成的伤害相等的命中数。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 萨满会进行两次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 5}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})砍击伤害。

action.name: Kukri Knife
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 7}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Bear Trap {@recharge 5}
entries: 萨满下了一个{@item hunting trap|PHB}。

action.name: Fire Flask {@recharge}
entries: 萨满将一壶易燃液体抛向60英尺外的一个点。在所选地点10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 15}灵巧的救赎中成功，否则就会受到12({@damage 5d4})的火焰伤害。如果救赎成功，伤害会减半。
火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到萨满下一回合结束。在这段时间内进入该区域的生物必须做一个{@dc 16}的灵巧救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害。如果救赎成功，伤害将减半。

action.name: Nail Bomb {@recharge}
entries: 萨满放下一个钉子炸弹，一小部分黑色粉末被许多金属钉子包围，上面有一块压力板。踩在压板上的生物以及5英尺范围内的任何其他生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}的灵巧救赎，否则将受到10({@damage 4d4})的穿刺伤害。
未能通过灵巧救赎的生物在下一回合开始时会受到额外的10({@damage 3d6})坏死性伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 萨满在对付一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在他们的反击上加3。要做到这一点，萨满必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

reaction.name: Raven's Beak
entries: 如果萨满在自己的回合中采取闪避动作后，近身攻击没有击中萨满，萨满可以以优势对发动攻击的生物进行一次库克里刀攻击，该攻击没有击中。一旦命中，目标生物必须在下一回合开始时成功地进行一次（%0%）宪法救赎，否则将受到10（%1%）的坏死伤害。该生物在1分钟内的每个回合都会重复这一救赎，或者直到它成功为止。这个效果的多个实例可以叠加。

trait.name: Punch Through
entries: 每当乔蒙根用它的战锤进行近战攻击时处于劣势，如果攻击没有命中，但两个{@dice d20}卷中较高的卷会命中，则目标会受到相当于其力量修正值的重击伤害（最小为0）。

trait.name: Jotunn Gift
entries: 如果乔蒙根人成功地抓住了一个生物，乔蒙根人在下一次对（%0%）生物的近战攻击卷轴上有优势，只要该生物还在（%1%）。
一旦命中，该生物就会被推回5英尺，结束抓捕，并且Jormungandr会获得与攻击造成的伤害相等的命中点。

trait.name: Jotunn Farewell
entries: 如果乔蒙根在它的回合中成功地用战锤攻击击中了一个生物，他们可以立即对该生物进行一次有优势的徒手攻击作为奖励动作。
一旦命中，该生物将被推后5英尺，并且Jormungandr获得与攻击造成的伤害相等的命中率。

trait.name: Serpent Smite
entries: 如果乔蒙根人向一个生物直接移动至少10英尺，并对其进行近战攻击，乔蒙根人在攻击卷上获得优势。

trait.name: Hamarr Slam
entries: Jormungandr对一个{@condition prone}的生物造成额外的9({@damage 2d8})伤害。

trait.name: Hamarr's Favour
entries: 如果乔蒙根人用他们的战锤攻击击中了%0%的生物，他们会获得与所受伤害相等的临时命中率。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Jormungandr用其战锤进行两次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})重击伤害，如果双手使用，则是9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。一旦命中，目标必须成功地进行{@dc 15}力量救赎，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

action.name: Light Hammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 7}击中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。一旦命中，目标必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}体质测试，否则将被{@condition incapacitated}击倒，直到下一个回合开始，并被击倒{@condition prone}。

action.name: Twilight of the Gods {@recharge}
entries: Jormungandr将它的锤子砸向地面。每个在乔蒙根10英尺范围内的生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}宪法救赎，否则会受到7({@damage 2d6})的重击伤害，被击倒{@condition prone}和{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一个回合开始。

reaction.name: Jotunn Grudge
entries: Jormungandr在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在他们的AC上增加3的反应。要做到这一点，Jormungandr必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。如果在招架后攻击未果，乔蒙根人可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次徒手攻击。
一旦命中，该生物会被推后5英尺，并且Jormungandr获得与所受伤害相等的命中率。

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: Kensei在对被（%0%）和（%1%）的救赎上有优势。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: Kensei可以使用它的额外行动来恢复7({@dice 1d8 + 3})的打击点数。他们在完成短期或长期的休息后，就能重新使用这个能力。

trait.name: Swift Strike
entries: Kensei可以用它的nodachi进行一次近战攻击，作为采取躲避行动的一部分。

trait.name: Dawn of the Steel Sun
entries: 如果Kensei在他们的回合中被nodachi攻击击中，他们可以使用他们的nodachi作为一个额外的行动，进行一次额外的优势攻击。一旦命中，就会造成额外的5({@damage 2d4})伤害。

trait.name: Helm Splitter
entries: 每回合一次，剑圣可以用他们的鞍座攻击而不是他们的nodachi进行一次攻击。一旦命中，该生物就会受到百分之零点几的伤害，直到他们下一回合开始。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kensei做两个nodachi攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来取代其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Nodachi
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d4 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Pommel Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Inspire {@recharge}
entries: 所有在剑圣15英尺范围内的盟友，在他们的攻击和伤害卷上获得相当于剑圣魅力修改器的奖励，直到剑圣的下一回合结束。

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: Kensei向地面扔出一个烟雾弹，它发出的烟雾在10英尺的范围内形成一个严重的遮蔽区。中等风（至少每小时10英里）在4个回合内驱散烟雾；强风（每小时20英里或以上）在1个回合内驱散。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 剑士在对抗一次近战攻击时，会在他们的反击中增加3分。要做到这一点，Kensei必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 如果Shugoki的命中率低于其最大命中率的一半，并且至少有1个命中率，那么在它的回合开始时，它将恢复9个命中率。

trait.name: Punch Through
entries: 每当Shugoki在用它的kanabo进行近战攻击时处于劣势，如果攻击没有命中，但两个{@dice d20}卷中较高的一个会命中，目标会受到相当于其力量修饰值的重击伤害。

trait.name: Rock Steady
entries: Shugoki不能被非魔法手段所击倒（%0%）。他们在对抗法术或其他会迫使他们移动的效果时也有优势。

trait.name: Hard to Kill
entries: 如果Shugoki的命中率低于其最大命中率的一半，它对所有的伤害都有抵抗力，除了精神伤害。

trait.name: Bonecrusher
entries: 每回合一次，Shugoki可以用他们的Kanabo攻击中的一个，攻击卷的惩罚为-5。如果攻击命中，他们会在攻击的伤害上增加+10。

trait.name: Headbutt
entries: 如果Shugoki在他们的回合中用第一次kanabo攻击命中，他们可以用徒手攻击来代替他们的第二次kanabo攻击。一旦命中，该生物就会被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一个回合开始。

trait.name: Demon's Embrace
entries: 如果Shugoki成功地抓住了一个生物，他们可以使用他们的额外行动，在一个怀抱中压碎这个生物。该生物受到14({@damage 4d6})的重击伤害，被击倒{@condition prone}并且{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一个回合开始。在使用这个特性时，Shugoki会重新获得与所受伤害相等的命中率，并结束抓捕。

trait.name: Charge of the Oni
entries: 当Shugoki采取冲刺行动时，他们可以在另一个生物的空间内自由移动，只要他们是大型或小型的。该生物会被移动到离Shugoki 5英尺远的地方，并且必须成功地完成一个{@dc 15}的力量反射，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Brave
entries: Shugoki在对人的救赎上有优势（%0%）。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Shugoki用它的kanabo进行两次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Kanabo
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: Shugoki向地面投掷一个烟雾弹，它发出的烟雾在10英尺范围内形成一个严重遮蔽的区域。中等风（至少每小时10英里）在4个回合内驱散烟雾；强风（每小时20英里以上）在1个回合内驱散。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Shugoki在对抗一次近战攻击时，会在反应中增加3的AC值。要做到这一点，Shugoki必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Storm Rush
entries: 如果八歧大蛇在它的回合中移动了0英尺，它可以采取准备行动来进行风暴冲刺。当一个有敌意的生物进入八歧大蛇的20英尺范围内时，这个动作就会被触发；然后八歧大蛇以其一半的移动速度向该生物移动，并以优势对其进行双手片刀攻击。一旦命中，它将造成额外的7({@damage 2d6})伤害。

trait.name: Lightning Strikes Twice
entries: If the Orochi hits with a katana attack on their turn, they may make one additional attack with advantage using their katana as a bonus action. On a hit, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

trait.name: Zephyr Slash
entries: The Orochi may make a single melee attack with its katana as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The Orochi can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Orochi makes two katana attacks. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Katana
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit or {@hit 5} to hit with both hands, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Kunai
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage. The Orochi can throw up to 2 kunai as part of an attack when it takes the attack action; for each thrown above the first it adds an additional damage die.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Nail Bomb {@recharge}
entries: The Orochi sets down a nail bomb, a small portion of black powder surrounded by many metal spikes with a pressure plate on top. A creature that steps on the plate and any others in a 5 foot radius must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 4d4}) piercing damage.
未能通过灵巧救赎的生物在下一回合开始时会受到额外的10({@damage 3d6})坏死性伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: The Orochi throws a smoke bomb at the floor, it emits a cloud of smoke that creates a heavily obscured area in a 10-foot radius. A moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses the smoke in 4 rounds; a strong wind (20 or more miles per hour) disperses it in 1 round.

reaction.name: Hurricane Blast
entries: If a melee attack misses the Orochi after they take the Dodge action on their turn, the Orochi may make one katana attack with advantage against the creature that made the attack which missed. On a hit, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Orochi adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Orochi must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Nobushi can use its bonus action to regain 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Way of the Shark
entries: When the Nobushi hits with an attack using their naginata, the creature takes an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage at the start of their next turn. Multiple instances of this effect stack.

trait.name: Cobra Strike
entries: The Nobushi may make a single melee attack with its naginata as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Poke the Nest
entries: If the Nobushi hits with two melee attacks on their turn, they may make one additional attack using their naginata that automatically hits as a bonus action.

trait.name: Jump Kick
entries: If the Nobushi hits with a naginata attack, they can replace the next attack they make on their turn with an unarmed strike. On a hit, the creature must succeed a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn, be pushed 5 feet back and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Viper's Retreat
entries: The Nobushi may make a single naginata attack with its naginata as part of taking the Disengage action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Nobushi makes two naginata attacks. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Naginata
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Trap {@recharge}
entries: The Nobushi sets down a fire trap, a small portion of black powder surrounded by a flammable liquid with a pressure plate on top of the casing. A creature that steps on the plate and any others in a 5 foot radius must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 5d4}) fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried and lasts until the end of the Nobushi's next turn. A creature that enters the area during that time must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity save or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: The Nobushi throws a smoke bomb at the floor, it emits a cloud of smoke that creates a heavily obscured area in a 10-foot radius. A moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses the smoke in 4 rounds; a strong wind (20 or more miles per hour) disperses it in 1 round.

reaction.name: Hidden Stance
entries: As a reaction to a creature attempting to make a melee attack against the Nobushi, the Nobushi may force them to make an opposed Dexterity check. If the Nobushi succeeds they dodge back into a deceptive stance and the triggering attack is wasted; the Nobushi gains advantage on their next melee attack. Otherwise the creature's attack happens normally.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Nobushi adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Nobushi must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Yama Uba
entries: When the Shinobi hits a creature with a kusarigama attack they regain 3 ({@dice 1d6}) hit points.

trait.name: Kusarigama-Jutsu
entries: The sickle-like weapons the Shinobi uses are on chains with a weight at the end. When the Shinobi makes a ranged attack by throwing one of their kusarigama they pull the weapon back to their hand by the chain as part of the attack.

Additionally the Shinobi may attempt to grapple a Medium or smaller creature after hitting with a ranged kusarigama attack instead of dealing damage. If the grapple is successful, the Shinobi can pull the creature up to 15 feet towards them.

trait.name: Slide Tackle
entries: The Shinobi may take the Dash action as a bonus action. Additionally if they take the Dash action and move at least 10 feet towards a creature they can attempt to perform a slide tackle.

The creature must succeed a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition incapacitated} until the start of its next turn. The Shinobi moves to the opposite side of the tackled creature. On a successful save the creature is not {@condition incapacitated} or knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Sickle Rain
entries: If the Shinobi hits with two kusarigama attacks on a turn, it can use its bonus action to make three more melee attacks with its kusarigama. Each of these attacks deals an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage on a hit.

trait.name: Nimble Attacker
entries: The Shinobi can take the Disengage or Dodge action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
Additionally the Shinobi may make one kusarigama or kick attack as part of these actions.

trait.name: Flying Kick
entries: Once per turn, the Shinobi can replace a kusarigama attack with a kick attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Shinobi makes two melee or ranged attacks with their kusarigama. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Kusarigama
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 10/20 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. On a hit the creature must succeed a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Shuriken
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage. The Shinobi can throw up to 3 shuriken as part of an attack when it takes the attack action; for each thrown above the first it adds an additional damage die.

action.name: Nail Bomb {@recharge}
entries: The Shinobi sets down a nail bomb, a small portion of black powder surrounded by many metal spikes with a pressure plate on top. A creature that steps on the plate and any others in a 5 foot radius must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 4d4}) piercing damage.
未能通过灵巧救赎的生物在下一回合开始时会受到额外的10({@damage 3d6})坏死性伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: The Shinobi throws a smoke bomb at the floor, it emits a cloud of smoke that creates a heavily obscured area in a 10-foot radius. A moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses the smoke in 4 rounds; a strong wind (20 or more miles per hour) disperses it in 1 round.

reaction.name: Shadow Strike
entries: The Shinobi adds 4 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Shinobi must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses after the parry, the Shinobi may make one kusarigama attack against the creature that made the attack.
If the Shinobi's attack hits the creature takes an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage at the start of their next turn.

reaction.name: Teleport Deflect
entries: If a melee attack misses the Shinobi after they take the Dodge action on their turn, the Shinobi may teleport to within 5ft. of the creature on the opposite side to where they were and make one melee attack with advantage against the creature that made the attack which missed.

trait.name: Dual Wielder
entries: The Aramusha gains a +1 bonus to its AC while it wields a separate melee weapon in each hand. It can use two-weapon fighting even when the one-handed melee weapons it is wielding aren't light. It can draw or stow two one-handed weapons when it would normally be able to draw or stow only one.

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Aaramusha can use its bonus action to regain 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Rock Steady
entries: The Aramusha cannot be knocked {@condition prone} by non-magical means. They also have advantage on saving throws against spells or other effects that would force them to move.

trait.name: Rushing Wind
entries: If the Aramusha moves at least 10 feet straight toward a creature and then makes a melee attack against it on the same turn, the Aramusha gains advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Tempest
entries: If the Aramusha hits a creature with all four of its attacks on a turn, it may make one additional attack with its dual katanas against the same creature as a bonus action. If the additional attack hits, it is considered a critical hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Aramusha makes four melee attacks, two with its dual katanas and two with its katana in alternating order. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Katana
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dual Katanas
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: The Aramusha throws a smoke bomb at the floor, it emits a cloud of smoke that creates a heavily obscured area in a 10-foot radius. A moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses the smoke in 4 rounds; a strong wind (20 or more miles per hour) disperses it in 1 round.

reaction.name: Blade Blockade
entries: As a reaction to a creature attempting to make a melee attack against the Aramusha, the Aramusha may force them to make an opposed Dexterity check. If the Aramusha succeeds they may do one of the following options against the creature and the creature's triggering attack is wasted:
- {@b {@i Ring the Bell:}} the Aramusha makes a katana attack with advantage. On a hit the target is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.
- {@b {@i Twin Vipers:}} The Aramusha makes a dual katanas attack with advantage.
- {@b {@i Push Back Kick:}} The Aramusha makes an unarmed strike. On a hit the target is pushed back 5 feet and knocked {@condition prone}.
否则该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Aramusha adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Aramusha must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Deliverance
entries: When the Hitokiri reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the Hitokiri gains 13 ({@dice 2d12}) temporary hit points.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Hitokiri regains 9 hit points at the start of its turn if it has less than half its maximum hit points and has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Rei Sweep
entries: Once per turn, the Hitokiri may make an unarmed strike instead an attack with their masakari axe. On a hit, the creature  must succeed a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Mugen-ryu
entries: When the Hitokiri hits with a masakari axe attack, they can make an additional attack against the same creature as part of that attack action. The Hitokiri may make up to three additional attacks this way in one turn.
If the Hitokiri uses their Mangetsu Rift trait, Meikai trait or Senbonzakura action, they do not gain an extra attack from this trait.

trait.name: Mangetsu Rift
entries: Once per turn, the Hitokiri may make one of their masakari axe attacks with a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, they add +10 to the attack's damage. This cannot be used on the same attack as the Senbonzakura trait.

trait.name: Meikai
entries: When the Hitokiri hits with a masakari axe attack, they can make a masakari backswing attack as a bonus action.
If the Hitokiri uses their Senbonzakura action, they do not gain an extra attack from this trait.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Hitokiri makes two masakari axe attacks. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Masakari Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Masakari Backswing
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Senbonzakura {@recharge}
entries: The Hitokiri makes a masakari axe attack with disadvantage on the attack roll. If the attack hits, it is considered a critical hit and it deals an extra 22 ({@damage 3d12}) damage.
Additionally if the creature is reduced to 0 hit points, it dies.

reaction.name: Righteous Deflection
entries: The Hitokiri goes to parry and adds 4 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Hitokiri must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
If the attack misses after the parry, they gain resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Vital Leech
entries: If the Tiandi has less than half of its maximum hit points, it regains hit points equal to the damage dealt when it hits with its dao attacks.

trait.name: Indomitable
entries: When the Tiandi drops below 20 hit points they gain 18 ({@dice 4d8}) temporary hit points. If the triggering damage would reduce the Tiandi to 0 hit points, they instead remain on 1 hit point.
After this is triggered the Tiandi regains the use of this trait after they finish a short or long rest.

trait.name: Dragon Dodge
entries: The Tiandi may make a single melee attack with its dao as part of taking the Dodge action.
Additionally the Tiandi may take the Dodge action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Dragon Kick
entries: If the Tiandi successfully hits a creature with a melee attack from its dao it can make an unarmed strike with advantage as a bonus action on the same turn.
On a hit, the creature must succeed a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 15 feet, knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Palm Strike
entries: Once per turn, the Tiandi may make an unarmed strike instead of an attack with their dao. On a hit, the creature must succeed a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be pushed back 5 feet and {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Tiandi makes two melee attacks with its dao. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Dao
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Battlecry {@recharge}
entries: All allied creatures within 15 feet of the Tiandi gain a bonus to their attack and damage rolls equal to the Tiandi's Charisma modifier until the end of the Tiandi's next turn. All hostile creatures within 15 feet must succeed a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the Tiandi until the end of their next turn.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Tiandi adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Tiandi must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Tiger Dodge
entries: As a reaction to a creature attempting to make a melee attack against the Tiandi after they have taken the dodge action on their turn, the Tiandi may force them to make an opposed Dexterity check. If the Tiandi succeeds they may make a single dao attack against the creature and the triggering attack is wasted. Otherwise the creature's attack happens normally.

trait.name: Against All Odds
entries: If the number of hostile creatures within 15 feet of the Jiang Jun is greater than the number of allied creatures (including the Jiang Jun himself) then the Jiang Jun and all allied creatures within 15 feet gain a bonus to their melee and ranged attack's damage equal to the Jiang Jun's Charisma modifier.

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Jiang Jun can use its bonus action to regain 8 ({@dice 1d8 + 4}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Tough Discipline
entries: The Jiang Jun has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Mighty Sanction
entries: The Jiang Jun may make a single melee attack with its guandao as part of taking the Dodge action.

Additionally the Jiang Jun may instead make an unarmed strike as part of taking the Dodge action, kicking the target in the shin. On a hit, the target is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Twofold Slash
entries: Once per turn, when the Jiang Jun makes a melee attack they may make an additional attack with their guandao as part of the same action. On a hit, the additional attack deals an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) damage.

trait.name: Fatal Swirl
entries: Once per turn when the Jiang Jun takes the attack action using their guandao, they may make their attack target all creatures within reach rather than one target.

trait.name: Sifu's Poise
entries: The Jiang Jun may use his bonus action to adopt graceful stance, any creature within 20 feet of the Jiang Jun that has to make a roll to recharge one of their abilities automatically succeeds on the roll on their turn.
The Jiang Jun may end this stance as a bonus action on their turn, or it automatically ends if the Jiang Jun moves or takes damage.

action.name: Guandao
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Fire Flask {@recharge}
entries: The Jiang Jun throws a flask of flammable liquid at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 10 feet of the chosen point must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 12 ({@damage 5d4}) fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried and lasts until the end of the Jiang Jun's next turn. A creature that enters the area during that time must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity save or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

action.name: Inspire {@recharge}
entries: All allied creatures within 15 feet of the Jiang Jun gain a bonus to their attack and damage rolls equal to the Jiang Jun's Charisma modifier until the end of the Jiang Jun's next turn.

reaction.name: Dou Shi's Choke
entries: The Jiang Jun adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Jiang Jun must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses after the parry, the Jiang Jun chokes the creature for a moment before slapping them back 5 feet, rendering the creature {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

reaction.name: Dou Shi's Swirl
entries: The Jiang Jun adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Jiang Jun must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses after the parry, the Jiang Jun may make one guandao attack using his fatal swirl trait.

reaction.name: Sifu's Dodge
entries: As a reaction to a creature attempting to make a melee attack against the Jiang Jun, the Jiang Jun may force them to make an opposed Dexterity check. If the Jiang Jun succeeds they dodge back into Sifu's Poise and the triggering attack is wasted. Otherwise the creature's attack happens normally.

trait.name: Deadly Duet
entries: The Nuxia deals an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature and the Nuxia are not within 5 feet of another creature, besides themselves, that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Nuxia regains 8 hit points at the start of its turn if it has less than half its maximum hit points and has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Hook Trap
entries: Once per turn, the Nuxia may make one of their hooked sword attacks a trap. If the attack misses they grapple the target and may immediately make a hilt spike attack with advantage against it.
However if the trapped attack hits, it deals no damage.

trait.name: Song of the Moon
entries: If the Nuxia successfully hits with all of its melee attacks on a turn, it may use a bonus action to pull the last creature hit by its attacks 10 feet in a direction of the Nuxia's choosing.

trait.name: Crescent Step
entries: The Nuxia may make a single hilt spike attack as part of taking the Dodge action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Nuxia makes three melee attacks with its hooked swords. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Hooked Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hilt Spike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Deadly Caltrops {@recharge}
entries: The Nuxia spreads caltrops to cover a 10-foot-square area within 30 feet of them. Any creature that enters the area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or stop moving and take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage. Until the creature regains at least 1 hit point, its walking speed is reduced by 10 feet. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the saving throw.
The Nuxia is immune to the effect of the caltrops.

action.name: Infection {@recharge}
entries: The Nuxia chooses a creature within 30 feet to make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save the creature, and any other creatures within 15 feet of them at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute, take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Thread of Fate {@recharge}
entries: The Nuxia chooses a creature within 30 feet to make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save the creature's movement speed is halved for 1 minute.

reaction.name: Echo Strike
entries: If a melee attack misses the Nuxia after they take the Dodge action on their turn, the Nuxia may make one hilt spike attack with advantage against the creature that made the attack which missed.

reaction.name: Mirror Raid
entries: The Nuxia adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the Nuxia must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses after the parry, the Nuxia may make one hilt spike attack against the creature that made the attack.

trait.name: Winner's Advantage
entries: When the Shaolin hits with a melee attack on its turn, then their next melee attack deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

trait.name: Shadowstep
entries: The Shaolin may make a single melee attack with its steel-capped staff as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Flying Monkey
entries: If the Shaolin moves at least 10 feet towards a creature and takes the multiattack action on their turn, the Shaolin may replace the first attack with their steel-capped staff with an unarmed strike. On a hit, the creature must succeed a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Qi Stance
entries: If the Shaolin makes a melee attack on their turn, they may use their bonus action to enter a Qi stance. While in this stance, the Shaolin's movement speed is reduced to 5 feet. The Shaolin may end this stance on its turn (no action required); this stance requires concentration, as if concentrating on a spell.

trait.name: Lotus Leap
entries: If the Shaolin makes a two handed attack with its steel-capped staff while in Qi Stance, the attack has advantage and deals 9 ({@damage 2d8}) additional damage on a hit.

trait.name: Sun Kick
entries: If the Shaolin is in Qi Stance, they may replace one of their steel-capped staff attacks with an unarmed strike with advantage. On a hit, the target must succeed a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the start of their next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Shaolin makes three melee attacks with its steel-capped staff. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove. They may also replace one of these attacks with Blink if they are able.

action.name: Steel-capped Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Blink {@recharge}
entries: The Shaolin teleports to an unoccupied space 5 feet behind a creature that is within 10 feet of the Shaolin and makes an unarmed strike against that creature with advantage. On a hit, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Blessed Projection {@recharge}
entries: The Shaolin chooses an allied creature within 120 feet of itself, it then teleports to an unoccupied space that is within 5 feet of the chosen ally.

reaction.name: Bounding Blossom
entries: If the Shaolin is in Qi Stance they may, as a reaction to a creature attempting to make a melee attack against them, force the creature to make an opposed Dexterity check. If the Shaolin succeeds they may make a single steel-capped staff attack against the creature and the triggering attack is wasted. Otherwise the creature's attack happens normally.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Shaolin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the Shaolin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Shadow Deflect
entries: If a melee attack misses the Shaolin after they take the Dodge action on their turn, the Shaolin may make one attack using their steel-capped staff with advantage against the creature that made the attack which missed.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Zhanhu's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to hit with spell attacks). They can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Zhanhu regains 8 hit points at the start of its turn if it has less than half its maximum hit points and has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Winner's Advantage
entries: When the Zhanhu hits with a melee attack on its turn, then their next melee attack deals an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) damage.

trait.name: Absolute Amplitude
entries: Once per turn when the Zhanhu makes an attack using their changdao, they may make that attack target all creatures within reach rather than one target.

trait.name: Violent Maneuver
entries: The Zhanhu may make a single melee attack with their changdao as part of taking the Dodge action.
Additionally the Zhanhu may take the Dodge action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Zhanhu makes two melee attacks with its changdao. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Changdao
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d4 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Zhanhu adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Zhanhu must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Subduing Counterblow
entries: As a reaction to a creature attempting to make a melee attack against the Zhanhu after they have taken the dodge action on their turn, the Zhanhu may force them to make an opposed Dexterity check. If the Zhanhu succeeds they may make a single unarmed strike against the creature and the triggering attack is wasted; on a hit the creature is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of its next turn. Otherwise the creature's attack happens normally.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: 每回合一次，士兵可以对其用武器攻击击中的生物造成额外的2（（%0%））伤害，如果该生物在士兵的盟友5英尺内，而该盟友不是（%1%）。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Beast of Prey
entries: The Warmonger may make either a single two-handed melee attack with advantage using its flamberge bastard sword or a single clawed gauntlet attack as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Corrupted Blade
entries: The Warmonger uses their bonus action to coat their flamberge bastard sword with corrupting energies. The next time the Warmonger hits a creature with a flamberge bastard sword attack that creature must succeed a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be afflicted with corruption.

On a failed save the creature, and any allies of that creature within 15 feet of them at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute, take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the corruption early on a success.

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: The Warmonger has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Elixir of Corruption
entries: When the Warmonger hits a creature afflicted by corruption with a melee attack they regain 5 ({@dice 2d4}) hit points.

trait.name: Power of Corruption
entries: When the Warmonger hits a creature afflicted by corruption with a melee attack they deal an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Preying Claw
entries: Once per turn, when the Warmonger hits a creature with a clawed gauntlet attack they can force them to make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and the Warmonger may use their bonus action to make a flamberge bastard sword attack that automatically hits.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Warmonger makes three melee attacks. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Flamberge Bastard Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage, or 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Clawed Gauntlet
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Corruption Blast {@recharge}
entries: Each hostile creature within 15 feet of the Warmonger must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save the creature, and any allies of that creature within 15 feet of them at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute, take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the corruption early on a success.

reaction.name: Impaling Riposte
entries: The Warmonger adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Warmonger must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

If the attack then misses, the Warmonger may make one flamberge bastard sword attack with advantage against the creature that made the attack. On a hit the target takes the attack damage as normal and is pushed back 10 feet with the Warmonger following the target.
If there isn't space for the target to be pushed back they are instead knocked {@condition prone} and take an additional 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage from the Warmonger clawing at them.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the pikeman can deal an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the pikeman that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Tower Shield
entries: Whilst wielding this shield, if the pikeman is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it can use its reaction to take no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, interposing the shield between itself and the source of the effect. Additionally it counts as being in half cover against ranged attacks whilst wielding this shield.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Steel Will
entries: The Gryphon has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Gryphon's Shove
entries: The Gryphon may replace their first attack on their turn with an unarmed strike. On a hit, the creature takes 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and must succeed a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and pushed back 5 feet.

trait.name: Dauntless Chase
entries: If the Gryphon moves at least 10 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with the next Bardiche attack it makes on the same turn, it can force that creature to succeed a {@dc 15} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice). On a failed save, the creature is moved to within 5ft. of the Gryphon on the opposite side to where they were, be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and knocked {@condition prone}. Large creatures have advantage on the saving throw; Small or smaller creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw.

If the creature succeeds the Strength saving throw the Gryphon stops adjacent to the creature. If the creature succeeds the Dexterity saving throw the Gryphon continues moving past the creature for 10 feet before stopping.
This cannot be used on the same attack as the Forceful Swirl or Soul Cleaver traits.

trait.name: Forceful Swirl
entries: The Gryphon may make their first Bardiche attack on their turn target all creatures within reach rather than one target.
This cannot be used on the same attack as the Dauntless Chase or Soul Cleaver traits.

trait.name: Veteran's Kick
entries: The Gryphon may replace their third Bardiche attack on their turn for an unarmed strike. On a hit, the creature takes 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and must succeed a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and pushed back 5 feet.
If the unarmed strike hits, the Gryphon may make one Bardiche attack with advantage as a bonus action.

trait.name: Soul Cleaver
entries: The Gryphon may make a single melee attack with its Bardiche as part of taking the Dodge action.
This cannot be used on the same attack as the Dauntless Chase or Forceful Swirl traits.

trait.name: Winner's Advantage
entries: When the Gryphon hits with a melee attack on its turn, then their next melee attack deals an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Gryphon makes three melee attacks with its Bardiche. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Bardiche
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stern Stare {@recharge 5}
entries: The Gryphon chooses one creature it can see within 30 feet. The target must succeed a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Draconite Bolt {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage. On a hit, each creature friendly to the Gryphon within 30 feet of the target regains 5 ({@dice 2d4}) hitpoints.

action.name: Draconite Cleanser (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The Gryphon lights and throws a bomb of odd alchemical origin at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 10 feet of the chosen point must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 3d4}) fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.
For the next minute, each creature friendly to the Gryphon within 10 feet of the chosen point at the start of their turn regains 2 ({@dice 1d4}) hitpoints.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Gryphon adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Gryphon must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: The Kyoshin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Aoarashi
entries: The Kyoshin may replace their second shikomizue blade attack on their turn for a shikomizue scabbard attack. On a hit, in addition to the damage, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.
If the shikomizue scabbard attack hits, the Kyoshin may make one shikomizue blade attack with advantage as a bonus action.

trait.name: Sajin-Arashi
entries: The Kyoshin may make a single melee attack with its shikomizue blade as part of taking the Dodge action.

Additionally the Kyoshin may instead make an unarmed strike as part of taking the Dodge action, kicking the target. On a hit, the creature takes 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage and is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Kaze Stance
entries: The Kyoshin can use its action to assume this defensive stance; if it has taken the attack or multiattack action on its turn, it may do this as a bonus action. Whilst in this stance the Kyoshin's movement is reduced to 5 feet, it gains +3 to its AC and may only take the Fujin Cuts action and the Tengukaze reaction.

The Kyoshin can exit this stance as a bonus action on their turn; they automatically exit this stance after they take the Fujin Cuts action, use the Tengukaze reaction or if they are {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition stunned} or knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Hikari to Kage
entries: When the Kyoshin hits with an attack using their shikomizue blade while in Kaze Stance or as part of the Crushing Counterstrike reaction, the creature takes an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage at the start of their next turn and the Kyoshin regains hit points equal to that additional damage.
Multiple instances of this effect stack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Kyoshin makes two shikomizue blade attacks. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Shikomizue Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shikomizue Scabbard
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fujin Cuts (Only in Kaze Stance)
entries: The Kyoshin makes a shikomizue blade attack against a creature within range. If the attack hits, they can make an additional shikomizue blade attack against the same creature as part of this action. The Kyoshin may make up to four attacks this way in one turn.

reaction.name: Crushing Counterstrike
entries: While not in Kaze Stance, as a reaction to a creature attempting to make a melee attack against the Kyoshin, the Kyoshin may force them to make an opposed Dexterity check. If the Kyoshin succeeds they may make a single shikomizue blade attack against the creature and the triggering attack is wasted. Otherwise the creature's attack happens normally.

reaction.name: Tengukaze
entries: While in Kaze Stance, as a reaction to a creature missing a melee attack against the Kyoshin, the Kyoshin may take the Fujin Cuts action against the creature as part of this reaction. The first attack of the Fujin Cuts action is made with advantage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: While not in Kaze Stance, the Kyoshin adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Kyoshin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Pirate makes two cutlass attacks. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Cutlass
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Trick Shot {@recharge}
entries: The Pirate makes a pistol attack. On a hit, the shot ricochets and the Pirate may repeat the attack against another creature within 10 feet of the the previous target; it may repeat this way a number of times up to the pirate's Dexterity modifier.

action.name: Pocket Bomb {@recharge 5}
entries: The Pirate can light and throw a black powder bomb at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

action.name: Gundpowder Surprise {@recharge}
entries: The Pirate fires a hand cannon at a point up to 30 feet away. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage, be pushed 10 feet away from the point and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Close Quarter Fighter
entries: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on ranged attack rolls the Pirate makes with its pistol.

trait.name: Sea Wolf's Glide
entries: The Pirate may make a single melee attack with its cutlass as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Pistol Blast
entries: Once per turn, when the Pirate hits with an attack using their cutlass they may immediately use their bonus action to make an attack with their pistol or trick shot. On a hit, in addition to the damage, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.
If the pistol or trick shot attack is against the same creature the Pirate hit with their cutlass attack, it has advantage.

trait.name: Walk the Plank!
entries: Once per turn, the Pirate may make one of their cutlass attacks with a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, they add +10 to the attack's damage and may immediately use their bonus action to push the creature 5 feet away from themselves.
This cannot be used on the same attack as the Sea Wolf's Glide trait.

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: The Pirate has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Pirate adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Pirate must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

entries.name: Special
entries: Donning or doffing this glove-like weapon requires an action and you may hold another object in the same hand as the cestus. Unarmed strikes deal {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage whilst the cestus is worn.

entries.name: Special
entries: When wielding this weapon you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action when you take the attack action.

entries.name: Special
entries: You require a Strength score of 15 or higher to use this weapon effectively, else your attacks have disadvantage.

entries.name: Special
entries: You require a Strength score of 17 or higher to use this weapon effectively, else your attacks have disadvantage.

entries.name: Special
entries: When wielded with one hand this weapon gains the finesse property.

entries.name: Special
entries: When you hit with an attack with this weapon, you can make another attack as a bonus action. However it deals {@damage 1d8} damage on a hit instead of {@damage 1d12}.

entries.name: Special
entries: Once per turn, you may make one of your attacks with this weapon a trap. If the attack misses you grapple the target and may immediately make a hilt spike attack with advantage against it. This attack deals {@damage 1d4} piercing damage on a hit.
However if the trapped attack hits, it deals no damage.

entries.name: Special
entries: This sickle-like weapon has a chain with a weight at the end. When you make a ranged attack by throwing the kusarigama you can pull the weapon back to your hand by the chain as part of the attack.

entries.name: Special
entries: Whilst wielding this weapon you can use your reaction to add your proficiency bonus to your AC against one melee attack that would hit you; to do so, you must see the attacker and be wielding the weapon.

entries.name: Special
entries: The scabbard of this sword may also be used as a weapon; when you are holding the shikomizue and its scabbard in each hand they are treated as light weapons. On a hit the scabbard deals {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Special
entries: You can draw and throw up to 2 kunai as part of an attack when you take the attack action; for each thrown above the first you add an additional damage die.

entries.name: Special
entries: You can draw and throw up to 3 shuriken as part of an attack when you take the attack action; for each thrown above the first you add an additional damage die.

item.name: Plated Chainmail
entries: Made of interlocking metal rings and segments of metal plate, plated chainmail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows with the metal plates worn over larger flat sections of the body. The suit includes gauntlets and greaves.

item.name: Segmented Plate
entries: This armor consists of a fitted metal chest piece worn with supple leather along with a helmet, pauldrons, gauntlets and greaves. Although it leaves the joints relatively unprotected, this armor provides good protection for the wearer's vital organs while leaving the wearer relatively unencumbered provided they are strong enough to manage its weight.

entries.name: Special
entries: When wearing this armor, you can add 3, rather than 2, to your AC if you have a Dexterity of 16 or higher.
If the wearer has a Strength score lower than 13, their speed is reduced by 10 feet.

item.name: Wooden Curiass
entries: This armor consists of a fitted wooden chest piece worn with supple leather along with a helmet, pauldrons, gauntlets and greaves; with some variations featuring slats of wood used for reinforcement. Although it leaves the joints relatively unprotected, this armor provides good protection for the wearer's vital organs while leaving the wearer relatively unencumbered thanks to the lightweight material.

item.name: Metal Curiass
entries: Metal curiasses consist of several large shaped metal plates that cover most of the wearer's body. It includes arm and leg protection consisting of metal vambraces and greaves that are attached with leather straps.

entries.name: Special
entries: If the wearer has a Strength score lower than 13, their speed is reduced by 10 feet.

item.name: Buckler
entries: A small shield about the size of a plate that is made from metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 1. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

entries.name: Special
entries: Whilst wielding this shield you are able to use two hands to attack with weapons that have the versatile property. Additionally you can use your reaction to add your proficiency bonus to your AC against one melee attack that would hit you; to do so, you must see the attacker and be wielding the buckler.

item.name: Tower Shield
entries: A tall shield almost the size of a person that is made from strong wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

entries.name: Special
entries: Whilst wielding this shield, if you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you can use your reaction to take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, interposing your shield between yourself and the source of the effect.
Additionally if you move no more than half your movement speed on your turn, you count as being in half cover against ranged attacks whilst wielding this shield.
If the wearer has a Strength score lower than 15, their speed is reduced by 10 feet.

item.name: Draconite Bolt
entries: A crossbow bolt made from a curious material with odd alchemical properties. Whenever you hit an object using this ammunition, each creature friendly to you within 30 feet of your attack's target regains {@dice 2d4} hitpoints.

item.name: Draconite Cleanser
entries: A bomb of odd alchemical origin. As an action, you can light and throw the bomb at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (with a DC equal to 8 plus your proficiency plus your Dexterity modifier) or take {@dice 3d4} fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.
For 1 minute afterwards, each creature friendly to you within 10 feet of the chosen point at the start of their turn regains {@dice 1d4} hitpoints.

item.name: Fire Flask
entries: A simple glass flask containing a fiery, volatile liquid. You can throw the flask of flammable liquid at a point up to 60 feet away as an action on your turn. Each creature within 10 feet of the chosen point must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (with a DC equal to 8 plus your proficiency plus your Dexterity modifier) or take {@dice 5d4} fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried and lasts until the end of your next turn. A creature that enters the area during that time must make a DC 13 Dexterity save or take {@dice 3d6} fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

item.name: Fire Trap
entries: A small portion of black powder surrounded by a flammable liquid with a pressure plate on top of the casing. You can set up the trap on the ground as an action. A creature that steps on the plate and any others in a 5 foot radius must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take {@dice 5d4} fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried and lasts until the end of the triggering creature's next turn. A creature that enters the area during that time must make a DC 13 Dexterity save or take {@dice 3d6} fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

item.name: Nail Bomb
entries: A small portion of black powder surrounded by many metal spikes with a pressure plate on top. You can set up the bomb on the ground as an action. A creature that steps on the plate and any others in a 5 foot radius must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take {@dice 4d4} piercing damage.
Creatures that fail the Dexterity save take an additional {@dice 3d6} necrotic damage at the start of their next turn. On a successful save the damage is halved.

item.name: Pugno Mortis
entries: A crude black powder bomb. As an action, you can light and throw a black powder bomb at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (with a DC equal to 8 plus your proficiency plus your Dexterity modifier) or take {@dice 3d6} fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

item.name: Smoke Bomb
entries: A small orb designed to explode on impact and obscure a person's escape or creature confusion. As an action you can throw the smoke bomb at the floor, and on impact it emits a cloud of smoke that creates a heavily obscured area in a 10-foot radius. A moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses the smoke in 4 rounds; a strong wind (20 or more miles per hour) disperses it in 1 round.

item.name: Steel Plates
entries: A set of metal plates, such as arm and shin guards, designed to bolster the defence of lighter armors. If you wear these steel plates while wearing light armour or no armour, and using no shield, your AC increases by 1.

entries.name: Hidden
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) checks to conceal this weapon.

entries.name: Monk Weapon
entries: A weapon with this property is included in the weapons that you can use with the Monk's Martial Arts feature and Monks are proficient with this weapon in addition to their other weapon proficiencies.
